title: Simple question
body:
{{champion:64}} + {{item:3814}} + {{item:2049}} , what's the counterplay to this?

Edit: Take it as a joke which is not so much  a joke.

replies.body: Anything that can counter it is welcome. On paper I don't see anything able to stop a Lee sin with those 2 items.

Who you are playing is a huge factor in counter play ability, so i would need to know who you are playing.


Or give some champs you would actually want to know.


The General ability to counter playing it varies from champion to champion.
